text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/gvhd-sct-codes
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/gvhd-icd10-codes

name: GVHDTypeValueSet
title: GVHD Type Value Set
publisher: The Medical College of Wisconsin, Inc. and the National Marrow Donor Program

contact.name: The Medical College of Wisconsin, Inc. and the National Marrow Donor Program

description: Permissible values for types of Graft vs Host Disease, from SNOMED CT and ICD-10
